node.text: Recently the Women of Smog got together to make a beer and that beer is called Total Boss. Total Boss Red IPA is a collaborative effort between all the hard-working ladies at Smog City who set out to make a beer that resonates with them and commands your attention. The label artwork was done by @mrdavidruano and we’re totally in love with it! Check out this rad time lapse of his process. And mark your calendar for Friday, 7/16 when we releases Total Boss Red IPA in cans and on draft!

node.title: Total Boss Red IPA label design

node.text:
WE’RE TURNING 10!

We are canning our 10th Anniversary IPA RIGHT NOW! It releases tomorrow, but you can pre-order your 4-packs on our website NOW (check out the link in our bio to get to our web store). 

Brewmaster Porter grabbed the first 4-pack off the line to give us a preview of what you can expect from our 10th Anniversary IPA. Check it out and get ready to taste along with him tomorrow! This West Coast IPA is 6.5% and packed with Strata, Chinook, and Centennial hops. 

We’ll be releasing this beer at all 4 taprooms tomorrow in 4-pack cans as well as on draft. We’re kicking off the 10th anniversary festivities at 11am at the Torrance Brewery & Taproom and will have a huge beer list, rare bottle sales, food from @anarchyseafood & @vivacepizzeria and great tunes! We have fun stuff planned at all the taprooms, though, so take your pick and raise a glass to 10 years of Smog City with us!

Please note: Pre LA Country Health Dept. COVID rules still apply. A mask must be worn at all times when not seated at a table, you must be seated to drink beer, groups are limited to 8 outside/6 inside, and credit card only. We expect it to be a busy & super fun day. Thanks in advance for your patience if there’s a wait. We can’t wait to see you all!

#smogcity #smogcitybeer #smogcitybrewing #10 #IPArelease  #labeer #labrewers #discovertorrance #familyownerd #anniversary #wereoldbyLAstandards #westcoastIPA #stratahops

node.text:
Enjoy Red Wine Wishes alongside Brewmaster, Porter!

The red wine variant does not actually touch a bourbon barrel but is racked directly into Herman Story Red Wine barrels where it slumbers for two years. The wine barrels allow the beer to age gently, creating complexity and rounding out any sharp edges.  The most delicate of our variants, this layered journey of oak, chocolate and dark fruit is worth sipping and savoring. 13.47% abv

node.text:
Infinite Wishes 2021 is here! Crack open your bottle and taste along with our Brewmaster, Porter. This year's Infinite Wishes is 13.47% and tasting amazing!

Aged for 1 year in freshly emptied Bourbon barrels. Infinite Wishes, our bourbon barrel-aged imperial stout, is an absolute force of nature, inspiring folks from across the Southland to line up by the hundred.  This inky, jet black stunner is everything you expect from the style seamlessly weaving together char and vanilla from the barrel with dark fruit, caramelized sugars, and a wallop of decadent chocolate.  This stout is big and burly, yet not syrupy sweet.  It packs an intensely expressive bourbon character, yet the finish is a mild warming sensation belying the strength of this beast.

node.text:
The ever-popular Coconut Vanilla Infinite Wishes variant is back this year for your enjoyment!  The coconut vanilla variant boasts giant vanilla and coconut character from a healthy dose of vanilla and over 13 pounds of coconut per barrel. The beer then segways seamlessly into the expressive bourbon and rich chocolate character we know and love.

Learn more about this 13.47% chocolate coconut delight from our Brewmaster Porter and taste along with him after Wishes bottles release Friday, 3/12!

Please note: Coconut Vanilla pre-sale bottles are now SOLD OUT, but we still have the other 3 variants and regular Infinite Wishes available to pre-order until Thursday, 3/11 at 10am. And we'll have Coconut Vanilla Wishes on draft at the Torrance Brewery and Taproom starting Friday, 3/12 while supplies last!

node.text:
Peanut Butter Cup Wishes is almost here!!!!

Next up in our series of Infinite Wishes tasting videos is a brand new, crowd-pleasing variant: Peanut Butter Cup Wishes! The peanut butter cup variant smells like dipping a Hershey's chocolate bar into a freshly open jar of skippy peanut butter. Layered chocolate notes mixed with vanilla and peanut butter dance over the boozy bourbon character of wishes to make a drinking experience that feels truly decadent.

Check out this video from brewmaster Porter to learn more and experience what Peanut Butter Cup wishes is all about.

Head to the link in the bio to pre-order your bottles of Infinite Wishes today! Pre-sales end Thursday, 3/11 at 10am and the beers release on Friday, 3/12!

node.text:
MOCHA WISHES! What does it taste like? Brewmaster Porter’s here to tell you and walk you through this decedent variant made with chocolate and @ragamuffinroast espresso. 

We know that you normally have the chance to taste Infinite Wishes and variants onsite before buying bottles, but COVID has made that a whole lot harder, so we’ve put together a series of tasting videos we’ll be releasing over the next week to give you a preview on what you can expect with each of the variants. Now if only someone would invent taste-o-vision already….

Pre-sales of Infinite Wishes are going on now, so if you want to guarantee you’ll get your hands on these beers before release day, head to the link in the bio and order now! Infinite Wishes and the variants officially release Friday, 3/12, with Wishes weekend going on 3/12 - 3/14!

node.text:
Tomorrow, for the first time ever, we're opening up ONLINE PRE-SALES for 2021 Infinite Wishes Bourbon Barrel-Aged Imperial Stout bottles and all 4 variants! Don't miss your chance to grab these decedent goodies before they're sold out! 

Bottles include:
💥
2021 Infinite Wishes Bourbon Barrel-Aged Imperial Stout, 13.47%

🍷
2021 Red Wine Wishes

🍫 🥜 
2021 Peanut Butter Cup Wishes 

🥥 
2021 Coconut Vanilla Wishes

☕️ 
2021 Mocha Wishes in collaboration with Ragamuffin Coffee Roasters

The 500ml bottles of Infinite Wishes & variants go on sale at 10am tomorrow, 2/25. Pick-up starts Friday, 3/12. Variants are limited to 4 bottles per person! 

Order online & get the full details at www.smogcitybrewing.com or the link in the bio. We can't wait to share some Wishes with you!

node.text:
Quarantine Machine IPA makes its return TOMORROW!, 8/15! Here are Smog City Brewing Co. owners Laurie & Porter to fill you in on all the details on what makes this beer so special to us and why it tastes to good.
.
Quarantine Machine is a 6.6% West Coast IPA made with Simcoe, Mosaic, and Loral hops. It’s tropical, smells like gummi bears (Hairbo Gold Bears to be exact, the finest of all the gummi bears), and refreshing. 
.
You can pre-order your 4 packs online starting at 11am today (Friday, 8/14) for delivery, pick-up, or CA shipping tomorrow! And if advanced planning isn’t your thing, you can just swing by any of our taprooms starting tomorrow to stock up in person. And of course you can enjoy a cold Quarantine Machine onsite @smogcitybeer_steelcraft along with a meal. So many options!
.
Stay safe out there. We miss you!
.
.
.
#smogcitybrewing #smogcity #quarantinemachine #inthistogehter #gummibears #familyowned #labrewers #labeer #independentbeer #canrelease #westcoastipa #IPA

node.text:
2020 Bourbon O.E. is releasing TOMORROW (FRIDAY- ignore the part of the video where Porter says ‘Saturday’ 😂), just in time for the holiday weekend! Here’s Porter, our co-owner & Brewmaster, to taste the beer with you and tell you how to make sure it’s the perfect temperature for maximum tasting delight.
.
A Smog City classic and highly sought after barrel aged delight, Bourbon O.E. is an English barelywine that spends over a year in bourbon barrels. Bourbon O.E. has generous malt character that merges with notes of vanilla, caramel, oak, toffee, and pecan. As you crack open the hand waxed bottle, immense aromas of toffee, caramel, vanilla, sweet bourbon, and oak hit you. A soft bitterness and a touch of tannin from extended aging brings balance to an otherwise malty-sweet style. This year's B.O.E is clocking in at 14.9%, and is tasting oh so fine.
.
Bourbon O.E. will be available in 500ml bottles Friday, 7/3 at all locations and is now live online for delivery and shipping. $16/500ml bottle.

node.text:
Kumquat Saison is being released TOMORROW, 5/14 in 4-pack CANS! Our brewmaster and co-owner, Porter, is here is talk about what makes this seasonal release a beer worthy of kicking off our weeklong celebration of 9 years of beer and community.
.
You can pick-up 4-pack cans of Kumquat Saison at any of our taprooms starting tomorrow, 5/14 and place orders for delivery or shipping starting today after 11am! $22/4-pack of cans.
.
Kumquat Saison is a bright and refreshing farmhouse ale brewed in partnership with the nonprofit @foodforward This is our 5th year working with their team to harvest over 500lbs of kumquats per batch of beer to make this citrusy saison. A portion of the proceeds from every 4-pack of Kumquat Saison goes directly to Food Forward’s efforts to end food insecurity in Southern California and divert food waste from landfills.
.
We are releasing Kumquat Saison as part of our 9 year anniversary celebration that kicks off tomorrow! Given what this beer means to us and how important our community has been over the past 9 years, it seemed more than fitting given everything going on to highlight a great beer for a great cause in celebration. We’ve got a full line up of safer at home fun lined up for the week, including beer cocktail kits, food vendors at the brewery for to-go food, and anniversary party packs to go along with your 4-pack of cans so you can celebrate along with us at home. Check out the link in the bio for all the details.
.
.
.
#saison #smogcitybeer #anniversary #9years #independentbeer #familyowned #craftbeer #kumquats #foodforward #labeer #labrewers #beerpaperla

node.text:
New Beer Alert! We are releasing NIGHT HOWLER, a new Wood Cellar beer, this Friday the 13th that is pretty much the perfect beer for this rainy weather and impending day of evil.
.
Our owner/brewmaster Porter is back to explain what this beer is all about and what makes Night Howler and all our Wood Cellar beers so unique.
.
Check it out and then come on over to any of our 3 locations tomorrow to have a glass and take a few bottles home to enjoy with friends as you watch the rain and enjoy the gray skies.
.
Night Howler: Dark Farmhouse Ale aged in red wine barrels with black cardamom, 6.1%. Available at the Torrance Brewery and Taproom, @smogcitybeer__West & @smogcitybeer_steelcraft starting Friday the 13th. On draft and in 500ml bottles.
.
.
.
#farmhouseale #beerrelease #smogcitybeer #woodcellar #familyowned #independentbeer #labeer #craftbeer

node.text:
🏝FRIDAY 8/13 NEW RELEASE ALERT!! Get ready for some paradise in a bottle!🏝

Transport yourself to a sun-drenched beach on a lush island with our Tropical Farmhouse Saison. We took our amazing foudre-aged farmhouse ale and blended it with gobs of mango & guava puree to create a combination of pure delight. You'll still get a touch of white pepper character from the brettanomyces and a cleansing dry saison finish, and at 5.7% it won't put you under the table after the first glass. This taproom favorite has been previously available only on draft, but now we're squeezing this juicy explosion into bottles for the first time.

Come in for a glass of Tropical Farmhouse on draft, but don't forget to take home a bottle (or a case). Available at all taprooms Friday 8/13. Snag it on-line for quick pick-up, or skip the weekend traffic and place an order for shipping anywhere in CA!

If you're headed our way today, bring your appetite. @junglidtla is at the Torrance Taproom & Brewery for a special pop-up today 8/11 until 9pm!

#craftbeer #cellarbeer #labeer #labrewers #hoppedla #taproom #saison #fruitedales #tropical

Are you spending your weekend outside? 

Gear up, hit the trail, and take advantage of these cooler temps in support of your local CA State Park! Don't forget to wet your whistle with our latest release, Park Hopper Hazy IPA! Brewed in collaboration with our wonderful friends at @alvaradostreetbrewery and @parkscalifornia to highlight the incredible work they do to help increase accessibility to our state parks for all Californians!

Here's the good news! There are plenty of 4-packs still available at all 4 Smog City locations. Get it on the go at smogcitybrewing.com for quick pick up, or have it shipped to you anywhere in CA.

🍺@smogcitybeer_sgv
🍺@smogcitybeer_steelcraft
🍺@smogcitybeer__west

Even better news! Park Hopper is flowing out of our taps too! Come in for a recovery pint after a day in the outdoors and recharge your batteries.

Need some food to pair this hazy dreamboat with? @pinch_of_flavor_seafood is serving up some good eats at the Torrance Taproom & Brewery til 9pm tonight.

#outside #craftbeer #labeer #cacraftbrewers #hiking #outdoors #camping #adventure #taproom #hazy #ipa #parks #caparks

node.text:
HAPPY PARK HOPPER RELEASE DAY! 🌳 ☀️ 🍺 

The day we have all been waiting for is finally here. Our epic hazy IPA collab, Park Hopper, is dropping into all of our taprooms today! 

Park Hopper is the latest beer in our Community Impact series and was brewed in collaboration with fellow @1percentftp member brewery @alvaradostreetbrewery to uplift and support the amazing @parkscalifornia. This beer is a soft, extremely drinkable 6.8% hazy that is packed with 6 different hops for a melon fruit explosion. 

Come grab a 4-pack of Park Hopper Hazy IPA from any of our taprooms this weekend or order it online to ship anywhere in CA, then get outside and enjoy your California parks. We’ve also got Park Hopper on draft at all the taprooms for your patio beer enjoyment. It’s a beautiful day for a beer, y’all!

And if that wasn’t exciting enough, we’ve also got a limited amount of Park Hopper tees available for sale at the Torrance Brewery & Taproom and online NOW.

@oaxacaonwheels is onsite for the food. 

Happy Friday! Stay safe, enjoy the outdoors, and drink good beer. 

#beer #craftbeer #hazyipa #parkhopper #collaboration #collabbeer #smogcitybeer #smogcitybrewing #labrewers #labeer

Come on down to Smog City Brewing taprooms today, Thursday 8/5 for National IPA Day. We're celebrating the dankest of dank beer styles all day long at all 4 of our taprooms! Receive a special 10% discount on every 4-pack purchase of Strange Times VII Double IPA and Strange Times VIII Triple IPA. Discount applicable on in-person purchase only and is while supplies last. 

Don’t need any 4-packs? Just come on over and enjoy a pint or two of our IPAs or build an IPA flight to try them all!

We’ve got @bellysslidersandwings at the brewery today. Yes! HAPPY IPA DAY🙌🍺🙌

node.text:
Ready for the deets on our amazing, super collab beer, Park Hopper, release on Friday!?!?!  Well here they are!

This Friday, we are dropping the next beer in our Community Impact series, Park Hopper Hazy IPA. This dreamy, creamy, pillowy hazy was brewed in collaboration with fellow @1percentftp brewery @alvaradostreetbrewery to support our friends at @parkscalifornia 

Our version of the beer is a 6.8% hazy dream. It’s packed with 6 different hops (yup, 6!). We started with Centennial & Idado in the kettle, then packed on the hop goodness with a dry hop of El Dorardo, Vic Secret, Amarillo, & Sabro. The resulting beer is like the ripest piece of honeydew you’ve ever had mixed with a not too sweet orange creamsicle. 

Park Hopper Hazy IPA will be available in 4-pack cans at all 4 taprooms and online for CA shipping starting Friday, 8/6! We’ll also have it on draft at our taprooms for your weekend enjoyment. Come out and be sure to show your support to Parks California this weekend and enjoy some Park Hopper! 

TLDR: Park Hopper tastes amazing and will be available Friday.

The Community Impact Series is made up of 4 unique beers brewed in partnership with 4 California non-profits highlighting the great work these non-profits are doing and supporting them through our 1% For The Planet commitment. We pledge to give 1% of our profits to environmentally-focused organizations for positive impact now and for future generations to come! Be sure to head to the link in our bio to learn more about Parks California and all the amazing work they are doing to make our parks more accessible to all!

#parkhopper #hazyipa #1percentfortheplanet #smogcitybrewing #smogcitybeer #collaboration #craftbeer #beerrelease #labrewers #labeer #parks #saveourparks #parksforall

node.text:
We are releasing the next beer in our Community Impact Series THIS FRIDAY and it is a super, super special release that our entire team is beyond excited about!

Make sure to come see us at any of our taprooms this Friday to grab a 4-pack of Park Hopper Hazy IPA brewed in partnership with the one and only @alvaradostreetbrewery and the amazing organization @parkscalifornia 

This 6.8% hazy IPA was brewed to bring awareness to the great work Parks California is doing, a nonprofit we support through out 1% for the Planet commitment. 

We’ll tell ya more about the beer tomorrow (it’s canning tomorrow!), but today is all about Parks California! Please take a few minutes to check them out and show your support this Friday!

🌳Who is Parks California?🌳
Parks California is a statewide nonprofit working to ensure state, regional, and local parks thrive. As a statutory partner to California State Parks, Parks California has a simple mission – to help strengthen parks and inspire all to experience these extraordinary places. From redwood groves and desert springs to urban parks and lighthouses, the organization works with partners to steward these natural wonders and make California’s parks more welcoming, accessible and relevant to all visitors. 

🌳Why are they excited about this collab?🌳
“Smog City Brewing Company’s commitment to find positive ways to impact the environment aligns with our collective effort to enjoy and protect California’s state parks for all - now and in the future,” said Kindley Walsh Lawlor, President and CEO of Parks California. “Thanks to Smog City’s support, together we will reduce barriers to these extraordinary places so all people can create their own lasting connection with nature.”

Check out the link in our bio to visit the Parks California website to learn more & we’ll see you Friday for Park Hopper!!!!! 

#craftbeer #labrewers #labeer #smogcitybrewing #alvaradostreetbrewery #collaboration #parksforall #saveourparks #beer #collaborationbrew

node.text:
We have another DOUBLE BEER RELEASE FRIDAY for you today!

We are releasing two very different, and very delicious beers for you today. First up is the one and only, the award winning, Smog City fan favorite: BOURBON O.E.! This year’s vintage was aged for a year in Heaven Hill & Buffalo Trace bourbon barrels, creating decadent notes of vanilla, oak, toffee, and caramel. With big flavor and a robust malt character to boot, this barleywine clocks in at an astonishing 14.5%. It goes down smooth and the bottles always go fast, so order yours today online or swing by any taproom to pick one up! We ship all over CA.  It’s also on draft at the taprooms!

And for those of you that are looking for a summer time thirst quencher, we’re bringing back NEW NORMAL German helles lager today! New Normal is everything you want in a lager: clean, sublimely refreshing, easy drinking, and balanced. 

PLUS, our SUMMER OF LAGERS programming is back starting TODAY, which means you can buy a Smog City .5 liter or 1 liter stein and get it filled up with New Normal and all our other Summer of Lagers specials we have planned for a great price all summer long! Just be sure to bring your stein with you every time you come for a visit and get ready to put those stein holding muscles to the test. Already have a Smog stein? Great! Bring it in starting today and we’ll fill ‘er up! (note that @smogcitybeer_sgv will have steins for sale starting Wednesday, 8/4).

It’s going to be a great weekend! Be sure to enjoy it with Smog City! We’ve got @oaxacaonwheels at the brewery for food.

#boe #bourbon #barrelagedbeer #germanlager #lager #summeroflagers #barleywine #smogcity #smogcitybeer #labrewers #labeer #independentbeer #beer #craftbeer #beerstagram #stein

Dust off your lederhosen. Iron your dirndl. It's almost time for Smog City's Summer of Lagers!

We're kicking it off this Friday 7/30 with the first Summer of Lagers release: New Normal, a 5.1% German Export Helles Lager. Clean and sublimely refreshing, this lager is made for cooling down on these sultry dog days of summer.

Purchase a half or full liter stein at a Smog City taproom and get it filled with the current featured rotating Summer of Lagers beer for a special price! (Steins will arrive at @smogcitybeer_sgv on Wednesday 8/4)

Check out this lineup of fresh lagers coming your way:

🔴7/30 - New Normal | German Export Helles

🔴8/20 - Slam Dunkel | German Dark Lager

🔴9/3 - Lager Reál | Vienna Amber

🔴9/17 - Smogtoberfest | Festbier

These beers will only be available on draft or togo for quick pick-up in crowlers or growlers.

READY, SET, PROST!

node.text:
EXCLUSIVE BOTTLE RELEASE THIS FRIDAY

Look for this year's limited batch of Bourbon Barrel-Aged O.E. to make its appearance at all of our taprooms Friday, July 30!

Emerging from bourbon oak barrels after spending an entire year conditioning, Bourbon O.E. is finally ready to make its way into your hands once again! Our intense barleywine style ale takes full advantage of your palate, merging decadent notes of vanilla, caramel, oak, toffee, and caramel. With big flavors and a robust malt character to boot, B.O.E clocks in this year at an astonishing 14.5%. Treat yourself to a glass of B.O.E. fireside or paired with a rich chocolate dessert.

We're not the only ones crazy about this beer. In 2019, Bourbon O.E. won gold at the San Diego International Beer Festival.

Bourbon O.E. will be on draft and to-go in 500ml bottles this Friday 7/30 for pick-up and CA statewide shipping!

node.text:
BIG NEWS: Mango Pango Tart Fruited Ale is now available at a craft beer store near you! Stock up on the ultimate Party in a Can today. Don’t see it at your favorite shop? Ask them to get it so you don’t miss out on the party!

Super fruity, a little tart, and a whole lot of fun, Mango Pango is delightfully refreshing and the perfect go-to. With loads of mango and peach juiciness, Mango Pango turns any time into party time!
